:::Atma/Psuedo/Time Warp/Airazor:::

Psuedo: I think you should tell the truth.
Atma: I think so too.  After all, Gramps was trying to kill everyone else, 
wasnt he?
Psuedo: Besides, the truth will eventually come out.
::They hear Windlord::
Atma: We'd better start looking for her then.
::They start looking, motioning Technosis to follow her::
~~~~~
::Time Warp continues walking in search of Infectra::
~~~~~
::Airazor transforms to beast mode and follows Tigerhawk::

--part1_a5.120fce6a.27cc5165_boundary
